title: Microsoft adds Copilot AI key to Windows 11 keyboard
text: Microsoft (MSFT) is adding a Copilot key to its Windows 11 PC keyboards, giving users direct access to its AI assistant program. It's Microsoft's first big update to its Windows keyboard in 30 years. Yahoo Finance’s Seana Smith and Madison Mills discuss Microsoft's AI initiatives amid excitement surrounding its partnership with OpenAI. For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here to watch this full episode of Yahoo Finance Live. Editor's note: This article was written by Eyek Ntekim.
